trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Lakeside Marblehead
There was one other sighting in Lakeside Marblehead on or around June 9th 2012
Summary: Red object flew from left to right and increased elevation then disappeared
divs: Sighting DetailsI was on lake Erie at shady shores yatch club and my miter in law, my wife and myself seen a red object flying and it caught our attention because it didn't flash light airplanes or helicopters. I walked out on to the dock to get a better view and it looked light the lights circled around the object and if flew from west to east when gained elavation and disappeared it was a very clear night when I was watching it on the dock it gave me cold chills from my neck to my legs the event lasted 30 seconds.
